attributes.additional_details: Deport all illegal immigrants within 2 weeks of their capture and tighten border controls. Any person harbouring illegal immigrants should receive a mandatory 2 year custodial sentence with their assets seized to pay for their custodial sentence. Any legal immigrant should take an oath to uphold the laws of this land and if they break more than trivial laws they should be deported within the 2 week time limit and all assets they have accumulated since taking the oath should be seized.
